Question: Does the productA provide 24/7 customer support?
Answer: Yes

Question: Is it a free service?
Answer: yes

Question: Why is productA providing a free service?
Answer: productA is absolutely free for consumers.Our aim is to bring transparency in healthcare prices and help everyone to get the best price.

Question: Where do I find productA doctor Profile on this app?
Answer: Select the test name and location and click on search. Once the list of providers appear and click on any provider(doctor) to view their profile

Question: Will the patient info be secured?
Answer: Yes patient information/data is secured as per productA terms and conditions.

Question: Who are productA’s users?
Answer: productA’s users are anyone who is willing to save money on healthcare services. Our most frequent users are uninsured

Question: What is productA
Answer: productA is a popular online price and quality transparency platform that helps consumers to shop for healthcare services like MRI

Question: If we book an appointment through you (productA.com) do I stand a better chance of getting an appointment?
Answer: Definitely. productA provides innumerable doctors for its patients. So patients can book an appointment as per their convenience.

Question: Are there any additional features I have access to with this app?
Answer: No

Question: How do I install the productA app for doctors?
Answer: Visit playstore and  Type: productA Pro

Question: Is it free to use?
Answer: Yes

Question: I booked an appointment through you with a doctor. Will I have to be there on time ? What if I arrive late?
Answer: productA encourages all its customers to honor the appointment timings

Question: Is it a free service? Why is productA providing a free service?
Answer: Yes

Question: Do I have to show the productA Appointment ID when visiting a clinic/hospital for my appointment?
Answer: Not required. You’ll show the voucher or electronic communication.

Question: Some doctors/clinics/hospitals in my area are not listed on productA.com? What do I do about it?
Answer: It may be possible that all doctors/clinics/hospitals may not be listed in productA. Hence we kindly request you to choose among the available doctors/clinics/hospitals. We are adding providers who are willing to share their cash prices

Question: Is productA safe to approach?
Answer: Yes productA healthcare is a trademark for safety

Question: What if a patient has any issues scheduling an appointment online?
Answer: if a patient has any issues scheduling an appointment online then our customer service agent will assist you when you have issues with scheduling. Patient has an option to reschedule/cancel the appointment as per his/her convenience.

Question: How can patients search for appointments?
Answer: They can visit productA website and search test or test location and then you can book as per the search entity.

Question: If a patient has an appointment booked at a particular time, can the patient book another appointment at the same time via productA?
Answer: No a person cannot book 2 appointments at the same time on the same day

Question: Is online scheduling available in multiple languages?
Answer: For now ZeaMed is only available in English.

Question: What should patients do if a specific reason for visit isn’t listed?
Answer: Patient can contact ZeaMed healthcare customer care.

Question: What internet browser provides patients with the best online scheduling experience?
Answer: It is recommended you use the latest versions of Google Chrome or Mozilla Firefox or Safari. The scheduling feature is compatible with Internet Explorer 11.
